Class OsmBinDataSet

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.data.OsmBinDataSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataSet
public class OsmBinDataSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataSet

(c) 2008 by IDataSet implements the OsmBin-file-format laid out here
TODO: support relations, store bounding-box of ways, testcase for ways

Author:
Marcus Wolschon
